title: (x) hand written style sans in Mo Willems kids' book "Knuffle Bunny" - Coop Light {Angel}
content:
This hand-lettered style sans serif appears in the wonderful Mo Willems kids' book "Knuffle Bunny" - what the heck is it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130107110432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Knuffle%20Bunny_6538.png)
author: Thomas Phinney

comments.content:
Yup, I think that's it. Thanks!

Hoping Rich Roat doesn't see this and give me a hard time. :)

Regards,

T
Tell me about it. I once had a famous designer on my case because I didn't recognise his font and mistook it for somebody else's (it was all in good humour though). :^D
